thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com
thread.title: Joyce
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Joyce

author: Joyce
title: Joyce
text: I like the timely manner in which the Chux's that I order arrives in one day. Therefore, I am never worried about delivery and whether I have enough to last. I also like the quality and price of the bed mats. Home care for a Dementia patient is never easy so I appreciate any effort that makes it less stressful!
